table.Name: wcms_Url
table.Title: a_menu_url
table.SQL_SELECT_LIST:
declare @totalItem int, @totalPage int set @totalItem = ( select count(0) from wcms_Url where 1 = 1 { AND Url_Source <o> @Search:Url_Source } { AND Url_Destination <o> @Search:Url_Destination } { AND Url_PageID <o> @Search:Url_PageID } ) if (@pageSize < 1) set @pageSize = 15 set @totalPage = ceiling(@totalItem * 1.0 / @pageSize) if (@pageIndex < 1) set @pageIndex = 1 if (@pageIndex > @totalPage) set @pageIndex = @totalPage
select [Url_ID] ,[Url_Source] ,[Url_Destination] ,[Url_PageID] ,[Url_SiteID] ,case when [Url_A] = 1 then 'checked' else '' end as [Url_A] ,0 as [locked] from ( select top (@pageIndex * @pageSize) ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY {@Sort} {@Asc}) as [num] ,[Url_ID] ,[Url_Source] ,[Url_Destination] ,[Url_PageID] ,[Url_SiteID] ,[Url_A] from wcms_Url where 1 = 1 { AND Url_Source <o> @Search:Url_Source } { AND Url_Destination <o> @Search:Url_Destination } { AND Url_PageID <o> @Search:Url_PageID } ) tb where [num] between (@pageIndex - 1 ) * @pageSize + 1 and @pageIndex * @pageSize select @totalItem, @pageSize, @pageIndex
table.SQL_UPDATE_ACTIVE: update wcms_Url set [Url_A]= @active where Url_ID = @editID select @editID
table.SQL_DELETE: delete from wcms_Url where Url_ID = @delID select 1
